name: WVA Sample Dialog
description: Sample dialog workspace with built-in payment and update flows

output.text: Anything else I can help you with?
Error processing your credit card details. Anything else I can help you with?
Hi my name is %agent_name%. %greeting_message%
We do not support autopay yet. Please try later. Anything else I can help you with?
We do not support bank transfer payments yet. Please try again later. Anything else I can help you with?
We do not support deferring payments yet. Please try later. Anything else I can help you with?
We do not support paying in installments yet. Please try later. Anything else I can help you with?
We do not support paypal payments yet. Please try again later. Anything else I can help you with?
We're sorry, there was an error processing that address. Anything else I can help you with?
Your $address_type address has been updated. Anything else I can help you with?

values: Thank you for using us. What else can I help you with?
There was an error processing your payment. Please try again.
There was an error while sending your receipt. Please type 'agent' to chat with a human agent.

output.text: Sorry about this. Let me connect you to an agent who can help you with updating your $address_type address.
Sorry about this. Let me connect you to an agent who can help you with updating your $email_type email.
Sorry about this. Let me connect you to an agent who can help you with updating your $phone_number_type number.

text: Your email address for $email_type has been updated to |&user_email_address|.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Is there anything else I can help you with?

values: I can't handle that right now. Please try again later.
Processing your payment...

output.text: Do you want this new number to be your primary or secondary contact number?

Which phone number?

values: Accessing your account information...

text: Is the information you entered correct?
